DOC.brief_summary: Study population : Patients treat physiotherapy potentially repairable rotator cuff tear period 2002 2005 . Study Method : At time diagnosis ( 2002 2005 ) study patient examine clinically , sonographically MRI . Some patient also complete shoulder score . All study patient reexamine , 8 10 year diagnose . Reexamination include history taking , clinical examination , completion three shoulder score ( two shoulder specific score , one general health score ) , Sonography MRI . Findings interest - number relapse follow-up , - need surgical treatment follow-up , - deterioration tear anatomy ( tear size , muscle atrophy , fatty degeneration ) follow-up - actual clinical shoulder condition ( give shoulder score ) reexamination . Study purpose : We want assess anatomic clinical long-term result physiotherapy potentially repairable rotator cuff tear . We want find tear anatomy unrepaired rotator cuff tear deteriorate time deterioration associate development serious degree symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Anatomic Clinical Long-term Follow-up Conservatively Treated Rotator Cuff Tears
DOC.criteria: Fullthickness rotator cuff tear diagnose 2002 2005 sonography MRI . At time diagnosis ( 2002 2005 ) : Typical clinical symptom rotator cuff tear include pain laterally upper humerus , painful arc , positive impingement test ( Neer Hawkins ) Potentially repairable tear ( tear size 3 cm , muscle atrophy exceed grade 2 accord Thomazeau , fatty degeneration exceed grade 1 accord Goutallier ) . Treated physiotherapy least 3 month At time diagnosis ( 2002 2005 ) : Fullthickness tear subscapularis tendon entire supraspinatus infraspinatus tendon Other symptomatic shoulder pathology include long head biceps tendon pathology , acromioclavicular joint pathology , shoulder instability , inflammatory disease , glenohumeral arthritis Earlier treated rotator cuff repair study shoulder
